title: WTT: T206 C460 (1), Hindu (2) or S460 (5) for EPDGs and/or SGC 40s
author: t206hound

posts.post_title: WTT: T206 C460 (1), Hindu (2) or S460 (5) for EPDGs and/or SGC 40s
posts.post_content:
I really don't care how ugly (at least I don't think I do).   I'll also consider selling, but I'd prefer to trade.

Murphy (Batting) - Cycle 460
Dougherty (Portrait) - Hindu
Schulte (Front View) - Hindu 
Devore - S460 (x2)
Murray - S460 (x2)
Sheckard - S460

Thanks in advance
-erick
